scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../rag-backend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd rag-backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install-deps: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../rag-backend && npm install && cd ../backendvaibhav && npm install
scripts.postinstall: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../rag-backend && npm install
